name: Vegan Garlic Noodles
description: Vegan garlic noodles only take 15 minutes to make and are perfect for a busy weeknight when you need dinner on the table fast!

video.name: VEGAN GARLIC NOODLES | 15 MINUTE VEGAN DINNER - Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN GARLIC NOODLES

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-garlic-noodles/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Vegan garlic noodles only take 15 minutes to make and are perfect for a busy weeknight when you need dinner on the table fast!

Coming at you with an easy, tasty, fast, and inexpensive pasta dish that curbs your craving for Asian takeout! These easy garlic noodles are flavor central! If youâ€™re not a huge fan of garlic, you can adapt this recipe and use a bit less garlic and add some shallots instead. It will still be delicious with that sweet and salty sauce and those mushrooms.

******MORE PASTA FROM THE BLOG******


COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

Connect with me on Social Media:

Music: Epidemic Sound 

#garlicnoodles #vegannoodles #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 1 cup thinly sliced or chopped mushroom
1/4-1/3 cup water, broth or pasta water
2  green onions chopped reserve green parts for garnish
3 tablespoons vegan parmesan plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Cook your spaghetti according to the instructions on the package. Boil a large pot of water and once boiling, add a good helping of salt and add the spaghetti and cook until al dente.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook your spaghetti according to the instructions on the package. Boil a large pot of water and once boiling, add a good helping of salt and add the spaghetti and cook until al dente.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make the sauce, heat the butter or oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Once starting to get hot, add in your garlic and cook until the garlic is starting to get golden on some edges. Stir frequently to avoid burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, to make the sauce, heat the butter or oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Once starting to get hot, add in your garlic and cook until the garlic is starting to get golden on some edges. Stir frequently to avoid burning.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add in the turmeric and pepper flakes and mix in. Then add in soy sauce, oyster sauce, brown sugar, and mushrooms and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add in the turmeric and pepper flakes and mix in. Then add in soy sauce, oyster sauce, brown sugar, and mushrooms and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 2 minutes and add in the sesame oil, green onions, and vegan parmesan and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 2 minutes and add in the sesame oil, green onions, and vegan parmesan and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in a 1/4 cup to 1/3 cup of the pasta water and mix in. Then mix your pasta and toss well to coat. Then take off of heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in a 1/4 cup to 1/3 cup of the pasta water and mix in. Then mix your pasta and toss well to coat. Then take off of heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and flavor then plate. Add some more vegan parmesan on top and some green onions and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and flavor then plate. Add some more vegan parmesan on top and some green onions and serve immediately.

keywords: vegan garlic noodles, vegan noodle stirfry
